| History                 = The Cheemuzwa, or the Silent Ones are a mystic tribe dwelling in caves of the mountains known as the Dark Hills. 

Encountering the Cheemuzwa, the [[Joshua Ayers (Earth-616)|Miracle Man]] convinced them to train him in their great power. They did so, but when he had mastered the skills he turned on them, trapping them under a landslide.{{r|Fantastic Four #138}} When Miracle Man was defeated by the [[Fantastic Four (Earth-616)|Fantastic Four]], the Cheemuzwa tribe took him away again,{{r|Fantastic Four #139}} trying to tutor him once more in their ways. Miracle Man subdued them and forced them to Earth with him, enacting a christams story with the [[Keewazi (Earth-616)|Keewazi tribe]]. After he was defeated by the [[Benjamin Grimm (Earth-616)|Thing]] and [[Johnathon Blaze (Earth-616)|Ghost Rider]], they once more took his physical form with them.{{r|Marvel Two-In-One #8}}
